name: adamo-sign-dashboard-microservice
description: Backend development for Adamo Sign dashboard Microservice

scripts.build:lambda: node esbuild.config.js && mkdir -p templates && cp -R src/application/services/templates/* templates/
scripts.build: tsc && mkdir -p dist/application/services/templates && cp -R src/application/services/templates/* dist/application/services/templates/ && mkdir -p dist/i18n/locales && cp -R src/i18n/locales/* dist/i18n/locales/
scripts.zip:nodejs: rm -rf nodejs.zip && mkdir -p nodejs && cp -r node_modules nodejs/node_modules && zip -r nodejs.zip nodejs

author: Alvaro Chico
